comments.body:
If we limit this to `python>=3.6` (that's the range we support on conda-forge only), this can be `noarch: python`. This will make the things a lot simpler.

```suggestion
  number: 0
  noarch: python
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +12,16 @@
build:
  number: 0
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv
